'''A Treatise on the Fundamental Principles of Lyre Playing''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Repertoire of Myriad Melodies (Achievement)|Repertoire of Myriad Melodies]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete all "[[Introductory Exercises]]" in the "[[Repertoire of Myriad Melodies]]."

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the violin textbook ''{{w|Versuch einer gründlichen Violinschule}}'' (''A Treatise on the Fundamental Principles of Violin Playing'') written by {{w|Leopold Mozart}}.
